service.name: ClearSkin

seo.title: ClearSkin® Acne Laser in Westfield & Carmel, IN | RELUXE Med Spa
seo.description: Comfortable laser for active acne with built-in cooling. Helps reduce bacteria and inflammation. Often done in a 3-treatment series.

overview.p1: ClearSkin targets acne-causing bacteria and inflammation with integrated cooling for comfort.
overview.p2: We typically plan a 3-treatment series and pair with smart skincare to calm breakouts and support healing.

whyReluxe.title: Cool comfort
whyReluxe.body: Built-in cooling and gentle technique for easy sessions.

whyReluxe.title: Holistic support
whyReluxe.body: Skincare + lifestyle guidance for lasting results.

whyReluxe.title: Series scheduling
whyReluxe.body: Consistent cadence to stay ahead of flares.

service.tagline: Laser for active acne with built-in cooling.

howItWorks.title: Consultation
howItWorks.body: We review your goals, history, and design a personalized plan.

howItWorks.title: Treatment
howItWorks.body: Quick, precise session performed by our experts.

howItWorks.title: Aftercare
howItWorks.body: Simple steps for best results. We check in with you.

lasers.whyWeChoseIt: Energy + cooling for comfort and efficacy.

flexEverything.intro: A supportive therapy for breakouts and inflammation.

faq.a: Most patients describe mild, brief discomfort. We can use numbing when appropriate.
Some results are immediate; full effect often appears by 1–2 weeks depending on service.
